datasets.name: dnb_statistics
datasets.description: DNB (De Nederlandsche Bank) Statistics dataset containing Dutch financial and economic data across multiple categories including insurance & pensions, financial markets, balance of payments, and monetary statistics. Tables follow the naming convention: {category}__{subcategory}__{endpoint_name}. Example tables: insurance_pensions__insurers__insurance_corps_balance_sheet_quarter, financial_markets__interest_rates__market_interest_rates, financial_markets__bond_yields__dutch_state_loans.
